revised_title: Royal Society Officers, Medallists, and Awardees in 1964
tldr: This article from the Royal Society of London's "Notes and Records" in 1965 highlights the officers, medallists, and awardees of the society in 1964. It mentions the notable achievements and contributions of various scientists in fields such as physics, chemistry, biology, and medicine. The article also includes a group portrait of several medallists and a list of foreign members elected in 1965.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Science History
